name: Corsairs boat game
description:
Hatch coins, build harbors and commission research to build the most advanced boat pirate in the sea.

An incremental (clicker) game at its core, Corsair uses many elements from simulation games that give it a unique feel and play style. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient boat.

Take your time to build a wonderful boat and explore all the content.

More experienced incremental (clicker) players will love the emergent gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a ginormous boat with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.

Features
- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself
- Coins swarm!
- Dozens of research items
- Dozens of missions
- Many different harbors
- A "Nested" Prestige system has the game always feeling new
